name: The Bugger (SomeNiceGames)
description:
Good morning, good afternoon or good evening!

We are happy to announce our first Game Jam project: The Bugger! Our team is composed by Daniele Simas(SM), Caio Mota, Roberto Junio e Natan Santos(Devs) e Luis Coimbra(Artist). In our game you play as a programmer who created a fatal error by accident on his game. Now, out of options, he is forced to get into the system and fight against the bugs. Using the Bit Gun, the player must get the enemy’s binary code right in order to eliminate the bug in his program.

Instructions:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys: Player Movement
  • Mouse: Camera Movement/Aim
  • Left Mouse Button: Shoot Zeros
  • Right Mouse Button: Shoot Ones
  • ESC or P: Pause the game

The player has only one life, if hit he will die and shaw come back to the first level. The player can colect a shield that will protect him from a single damage until the end of the level. In the game, there are glitches which may slow down the player or even kill him if touched.

We hope you enjoy the game 🙂

How to install:

  • Unzip the folder
  • Play the .exe file
